title: Lightdash Chart as Code
description: Schema for defining Lightdash charts in YAML format for version control

version.description: Schema version for this chart configuration

description.description: Optional description of what this chart displays

slug.description: Unique identifier slug for this chart

spaceSlug.description: Path to the space containing this chart (e.g., 'sales/reports' or 'marketing')

tableName.description: The explore/table name this chart queries from

dashboardSlug.description: Optional dashboard slug if this chart is saved within a dashboard

updatedAt.description: Timestamp when the chart was last updated (readonly)

downloadedAt.description: Timestamp when this chart was downloaded from Lightdash (readonly)

metricQuery.description: The query configuration defining what data to fetch

exploreName.description: The name of the explore to query

dimensions.description: List of dimension field IDs to include

metrics.description: List of metric field IDs to include

filters.description: Filter rules to apply to the query using 'and'/'or' filter groups

oneOf.description: Empty dimensions filter array (no filters applied)
Empty metrics filter array (no filters applied)
Empty table calculations filter array (no filters applied)

limit.description: Maximum number of rows to return

metricOverrides.description: Override formatting and display options for existing metrics

suffix.description: Suffix to append to formatted values

prefix.description: Prefix to prepend to formatted values

compact.description: Compact format for large numbers (K, M, B, T) or byte units

round.description: Number of decimal places (shorthand for formatOptions.round)

tableCalculations.description: Custom calculations to perform on query results (like window functions)

name.description: Internal name of the table calculation

displayName.description: Display name shown in the UI

sql.description: SQL expression for the calculation (can reference fields with ${table.field})

type.description: Data type of the calculation result

suffix.description: Suffix to append to formatted values

prefix.description: Prefix to prepend to formatted values

compact.description: Compact format for large numbers (K, M, B, T) or byte units

fieldId.description: Field ID to apply the template to

orderBy.description: Fields to order by for window functions

partitionBy.description: Fields to partition by for window functions

additionalMetrics.description: Custom metrics defined inline (ad-hoc metrics not in the dbt model)

description.description: Description of what the metric measures

table.description: Table name the metric belongs to

baseDimensionName.description: Name of the base dimension/column this metric aggregates

hidden.description: Whether the metric is hidden from users

generationType.description: Type of generated metric (e.g., 'periodOverPeriod' for time comparison metrics)

baseMetricId.description: ID of the base metric for generated metrics

timeDimensionId.description: ID of the time dimension for period-over-period metrics

periodOffset.description: Number of periods to offset for comparison

filters.description: Filters to apply to this metric

id.description: Optional unique identifier for the filter

unitOfTime.description: Time unit for relative date filters

completed.description: For date filters, whether to include completed periods

suffix.description: Suffix to append to formatted values

prefix.description: Prefix to prepend to formatted values

compact.description: Compact format for large numbers (K, M, B, T) or byte units

dimensionOverrides.description: Override formatting and display options for existing dimensions

suffix.description: Suffix to append to formatted values

prefix.description: Prefix to prepend to formatted values

compact.description: Compact format for large numbers (K, M, B, T) or byte units

config.description: Chart-specific configuration (varies by chart type). See $defs/cartesianChart for cartesian chart structure.

columnOrder.description: Order of columns in table view

columns.description: Fields to use as pivot columns

filterGroup.description: Filter group containing filters combined with AND/OR logic

id.description: Optional unique identifier for the filter group

and.description: Array of filters or nested groups combined with AND logic

or.description: Array of filters or nested groups combined with OR logic

filterItem.description: Either a filter rule or a nested filter group

id.description: Optional unique identifier for the filter

tableName.description: Table name the field belongs to

fieldFilterType.description: Filter type hint (e.g., 'date' for date fields)

unitOfTime.description: Time unit for relative date filters

completed.description: For date filters, whether to include completed periods

tileTargets.description: Dashboard tile-specific filter targets (maps tile UUIDs to field IDs)

cartesianChart.description: Configuration for cartesian (line, bar, area, scatter) charts

layout.description: Layout configuration for the chart axes and orientation

xField.description: Field ID to use for the X axis

yField.description: Field IDs to use for the Y axis

flipAxes.description: Swap X and Y axes (creates horizontal bar charts)

stack.description: Stack series together (true for default stacking, or string for stack group name)

containLabel.description: Whether the grid area contains axis labels

sortType.description: How to sort the X axis

enableDataZoom.description: Enable data zoom slider for this axis

stack.description: Stack group name (series with same stack name are stacked)

yAxisIndex.description: Index of Y axis to use (for dual Y axis charts)

showOverlappingLabels.description: Show labels even when they overlap

hidden.description: Hide this series from the chart

areaStyle.description: Area fill style (presence indicates area chart)

smooth.description: Use smooth curves for line/area charts

isFilteredOut.description: Whether this series is currently filtered out

pivotReference.description: Reference to a field, optionally with pivot values

pivotValues.description: Pivot values for this reference (for pivoted data)

yAxis.description: Y axis value for horizontal line

xAxis.description: X axis value for vertical line

uuid.description: Unique identifier for this mark line

pieChart.description: Configuration for pie and donut charts

groupFieldIds.description: Field IDs used for grouping/slicing the pie

metricId.description: Field ID of the metric to display

isDonut.description: Display as donut chart with hole in center

valueLabel.description: Position of value labels on slices

showValue.description: Show the actual value on slices

legendMaxItemLength.description: Maximum character length for legend items

dataInput.description: How data is structured (row-based or column-based)

fieldId.description: Field ID to display in funnel

bigNumber.description: Configuration for big number (single value) displays

label.description: Custom label for the big number

selectedField.description: Field ID to display as the big number

showBigNumberLabel.description: Show the label above the number

showTableNamesInLabel.description: Include table name in the label

flipColors.description: Flip positive/negative colors (red for increase, green for decrease)

comparisonLabel.description: Custom label for the comparison value

selectedField.description: Field ID for the gauge value

maxFieldId.description: Field ID to use as the max value

showAxisLabels.description: Show min/max labels on the gauge

customLabel.description: Custom label for the gauge value

customPercentageLabel.description: Custom label for the percentage display

gaugeSection.description: A colored section/range in a gauge chart

minFieldId.description: Field ID to use as min value

maxFieldId.description: Field ID to use as max value

leafDepth.description: Depth of leaf nodes to display

colorMetricId.description: Field ID for node color value

startColor.description: Start color for color gradient (hex code)

endColor.description: End color for color gradient (hex code)

useDynamicColors.description: Use dynamic color scaling based on values

showTableNames.description: Show table names in column headers

metricsAsRows.description: Display metrics as rows instead of columns

name.description: Custom display name for the column

frozen.description: Freeze the column (stick to left side)

displayStyle.description: How to display the cell value

color.description: Color for bar display style (hex code)

target.description: Target field for the formatting rule

fieldId.description: Field ID to apply formatting to

color.description: Color for formatting (string for single color, object for range)

applyTo.description: Apply formatting to cell background or text

geoJsonPropertyKey.description: Property key in GeoJSON to match against data

backgroundColor.description: Background color for the map (hex code)

noDataColor.description: Color for regions with no data (hex code)

locationFieldId.description: Field ID for location/region names (area maps)

valueFieldId.description: Field ID for the value to display

sizeFieldId.description: Field ID for bubble size (scatter maps)

colorRange.description: Array of colors for the value gradient

minBubbleSize.description: Minimum bubble size for scatter maps

maxBubbleSize.description: Maximum bubble size for scatter maps

mapFieldConfig.description: Configuration for a field in map tooltips

visible.description: Whether to show this field in tooltips
